title: When you click on a Memes and Games thread with Champion jokes
body:
But some dude goes all Gameplay and starts wanting to debate about why "x" champ is good or bad or why the joke doesn't fit with the lore.

http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/nerdss.gif

replies.body: {{champion:3}}  Had somebody told me Galio is OP and Broken.... It was a all ap team OF COARSE ID PLAY GALIO

Downvoted because not {{champion:119}}.

... I'm probably gonna get downvoted for that... YOU KNOW WHAT? I DON'T NEED YOUR APPROVAL!

> [{quoted}](name=GetMariahCarried,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AAIQqb0b,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-27T21:59:07.405+0000)
>
> Downvoted because not {{champion:119}}.
> 
> ... I'm probably gonna get downvoted for that... YOU KNOW WHAT? I DON'T NEED YOUR *Adoration*

fixed
